answerText: Jun'ichiro Tanizaki[10] In this other Tanizaki novel, Joji is attracted by the western-looking title character and gives her English lessons to mold her into the perfect westernized woman.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 11 | 20 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Yukiko rejects Nomura's marriage proposal in one of this man's novels after Nomura speaks about his dead family members. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this writer of the essay In Praise of Shadows and creator of the doll-maker Taeko.
